title: Tokyo Station Main Entrance
content: The main entrance is located on the Marunouchi side. It features a grand facade with red brick architecture.

title: Basic Japanese Directions
content: To ask for directions, say 'すみません、道を教えてください' (sumimasen, michi wo oshiete kudasai).

title: Ticket Office Location
content: The ticket office is located near the Marunouchi Central Exit. Look for signs with 切符売り場 (kippu uriba).

title: Common Japanese Phrases
content: すみません (sumimasen) means 'excuse me' and is used to get attention. ありがとうございます (arigatou gozaimasu) means 'thank you'.

title: Station Layout Overview
content: Tokyo Station has multiple levels. The ground level contains the main entrances and ticket offices. The basement levels contain shopping areas and restaurants.
